definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be weak, sick (As. anâšu Zim:BP 56, 70; Wetzst in De:Psalmen, ed. 4, 882 der. fr. II. [[אנשׁ]] per antiphrasin; Dl:Pr 160 identified with III. [[אנשׁ]]; v. also De:Psalmen, ed. 4, 904; so Lag:BN 60, who comp. sayf 0’aniy3, weichliches d.h. stumpfes Schwert. It seems safer at present to keep the three distinct).

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[אָנוּשׁ]] Job 34:6 +; [[אֲנוּשָׁה]] Je 15:18, Mic 1:9 & so rd. Ps 69:21 (Bi Che) etc.; as adj. incurable, of wound, but metaph. ([[מַכָּה]]) Mic 1:9, Je 15:18; cf. Job 34:6 ([[חֵץ]]), Je 30:12 [[שֵׁבֶר]]; ‖[[נַחְלָה מַכָּה]]); so [[כְּאֵב אָנוּשׁ]] Is 17:11; cf. Je 30:15 ([[מַכְאׂב]]); cf. [[יוֹם אָנוּשׁ]] Is 17:16; also in phr. [[עָקׂב הַלֵּב מִבּׂל וְאָנֻשׁ הוּא]] Je 17:9
